text:
AN INDEX TO THE Forty-fourth VOLUME OF THE Philosophical Transactions, For the Years 1746, and 1747.

N.B. There being in this Volume 2 Supplements, one the Croonian Lectures for 1746, the other for 1747, a denotes the first, b the latter; thus pr. a. or pr. b. denote the Preface of each Year's Lectures, s. a. or s. b. stand before the Number of the Pages of the Lectures.

The Pages 351 — 358 are printed twice over; therefore to the second Numbers is added Zz. e.gr. 351, Zz.
